meta.dc:title: S2047 ENR: To provide for a 2-week extension of the Medicaid community mental health services demonstration program, and for other purposes.
meta.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
meta.dc:creator: Xcential BillDTD to USLM Converter v20200824
meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
To provide for a 2-week extension of the Medicaid community mental health services demonstration program, and for other purposes.

main.name: S2047

content.p: To provide for a 2-week extension of the Medicaid community mental health services demonstration program, and for other purposes.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Extension of the Medicaid community mental health services demonstration program.
section.content: Section 223(d)(3) of the Protecting Access to Medicare Act of 2014 (42 U.S.C. 1396a note) is amended by striking “June 30, 2019” and inserting “July 14, 2019”.

section.heading: Medicaid improvement fund.
section.content: Section 1941(b)(1) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1396w–1(b)(1)) is amended by striking “$6,000,000” and inserting “$1,000,000”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
